ygData.subject: Re: Specialization and Research
ygData.msgSnippet: We need a rune bazaar. It wouldnt be so bad if they were ALL common, but instead Ill get 5 of one kind, and the other one I need to combine for the spell is
ygData.messageBody:
We need a rune bazaar. It wouldnt be so bad if they were ALL common, but instead Ill get 5 of one kind, and the other one I need to combine for the spell is rare drop seemingly.

I tried practice runes, but those components were even worse. No troll has ever EVER looted froglok eyes apparently, and surely they should know! Where do you buy these things!

Shannyn



>>> "Brad Fetkovich" <fetko1@...> 01/03/00 04:42PM >>>
From: "Brad Fetkovich" <fetko1@...>

just play around in dungeons and such *glares at 5 backpacks full of runes*
and have guildmates save em for ya... it isn't hard to get research up, just
a real pain in the ass.

Fetko, lvl 50 wiz Mith Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: PHAEDRA WHITLOCK <PWHITLOCK@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, January 03, 2000 1:08 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Specialization and Research


> From: "PHAEDRA WHITLOCK" <PWHITLOCK@...>
>
> You need a massive collection of runes *Glares at the two backpacks full
in her bank account* and also you need PRACTICE runes. I forget where you
can read up on these, but try graffe.com
>
> Shannyn
>
>
>
> >>> "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...> 01/03/00 09:00AM >>>
> From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
>
> Hi folks,
>
> Just got lvl 20 the other day and am wondering about Specialization. I
> dumped as many points as I could into "Specialization:Evocation", but have
> absolutely no clue as to how it's supposed to work. What does it do?
Does
> it improve with use? What exactly needs to be used to improve it? etc...
>
> On another note, when I got to lvl 16, I dumped a point into Research.
Then
> at lvl 20 I dumped a bunch more points into research. I just tried
> researching a lvl 16 spell (pillar of fire, I believe) at lvl 20, and
failed
> miserably. How exactly do you practice this skill without needing a
MASSIVE
> collection of Runes?
>
> Thanks in advance,
> Olatan Ossur 20th Wizard on Solusek Ro
